summary: Three attendees at a puppet theater don various roles in order to sing a variety of songs by Jacques Brel, all while hippies and other eccentrics cavort about them.
cast: Elly Stone|Mort Shuman|Joe Masiell|Jacques Brel|Annick Berger|Moni Yakim|Bernard Lafontaine|France Lombard|Sophie Héroux|Nico Sirakos|Jean Schianno|René Quivrin|Paule Tanneur|Martial|Jean Nény|René de Castello|Michel Anthiome|Gonzague Claudet-Zeno|Mina Yakim|Rosaline Lequime|Claire Van Der Borght|Tina Costa|Jimmy Shuman|Raoul Yanes|Giannin Lorengett|Michel Herval|Jean Costa|Françoise Simon|Joseph Neil|Annette Perrone|Judy Lander|Shawn Elliott|Dwight D. Eisenhower|Charles A. Lindbergh|Joseph Stalin
keywords: drunk man|man wrapped in a towel|younger version of character|song|puppet theater
title: Jacques Brel Is Alive and Well and Living in Paris
